Class ReservationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReservationReader

  • public class ReservationReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ReservationReader has the responsibility of reading and maintaining the data from the reservations.csv file.
    Since:
    2016-11-10

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReservationReader(java.lang.String fileString) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyDiscount()
      This method allows the user to apply a discount to a certain reservation.
      Reservation findReservation(int reservationNumber)
      This method finds a reservation with the input reservation number.
      double incomeForDate(Date chosenDate)
      This method retrieves the total reservation income for a specific date.
      void printUpdatedReservationsToFile()
      This method updates the contents of the reservations.csv file with the current contents of the reservations ArrayList.
      void removeExpiredReservations()
      This method removes any expired reservations from the reservations.csv file.
      void update()
      This method clears the ArrayList of reservations and reads in the current contents of Reservations.csv file.

    • Method Detail

      • removeExpiredReservations

        public void removeExpiredReservations()
        This method removes any expired reservations from the reservations.csv file.

      • findReservation

        public Reservation findReservation(int reservationNumber)
        This method finds a reservation with the input reservation number.
        Parameters:
        reservationNumber - The reservation number of the reservation we are searching for.
        Returns:
        The reservation that corresponds to the reservationNumber entered or null.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method clears the ArrayList of reservations and reads in the current contents of Reservations.csv file.

      • printUpdatedReservationsToFile

        public void printUpdatedReservationsToFile()
        This method updates the contents of the reservations.csv file with the current contents of the reservations ArrayList.

      • applyDiscount

        public void applyDiscount()
        This method allows the user to apply a discount to a certain reservation.

      • incomeForDate

        public double incomeForDate(Date chosenDate)
        This method retrieves the total reservation income for a specific date.
        Parameters:
        chosenDate - The date that we retrieving the income for.
        Returns:
        income the total income from reservations for the specified date.
